name: Forgiveness (Adept)
flavor_text: "We all seek it, though few find it. The brave offer it, and humble learn from it. What am I?" —Dunya, Ghost of Aisha

perks.description:

  •  Increases handling speed

  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

Weighty barrel extension.

Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed

Barrel optimized for distance.

Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability

Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: This weapon gains increased airborne effectiveness as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Air Assault

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.
perks.name: Rapid Hit

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
perks.name: Multikill Clip

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus range until the wielder takes damage. The bonus returns when no damage is taken for a short duration.
perks.name: Fragile Focus

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Gain increased reload, stability, aim assist, and range when you are the last living member of your fireteam or running solo.
perks.name: Alacrity

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when out of combat.
perks.name: One Quiet Moment
